about_the_game:
【overview】
"Kamisaman(Isana Hakari)" is an additional character in the derivative fighting game "MGCM Combat Edition" where you can battle with attractive characters, magical girls, and demons from "New Generation Urban Pop Magical Girl RPG "I Am Magicami"".
She is a hardworking girl who guides the main character and magical girls, and is in charge of managing the Kamisaman system from a young age.
In terms of performance during the game, she is a character that is worthy of being an administrator, as she can use either long-reaching normal moves or excellent projectiles to develop either defensive or offensive strategies.

content_descriptors.notes: This includes costume changes to thinner costumes, and certain techniques that suggest sexual acts. It also includes depictions of blood splatter during battles.

She is a hardworking girl who guides the main character and magical girls, and is in charge of managing the Kamisaman system from a young age.
In terms of performance during the game, she is a character that is worthy of being an administrator, as she can use either long-reaching normal moves or excellent projectiles to develop either defensive or offensive strategies.
